overview: Asa, a second-year Political Science student, finds himself at one of the lowest points in his life due to the various demands and pressures that befall his life. He realized that he needed help, he realized that he needed to be heard. However, when he spoke, he was immediately judged instantly. Since then, Asa has become a fearful and introverted person. Until one day, Nala, a second-year Social Welfare Science student, approached Asa in the midst of his turmoil and changed everything.
title: Ranah Senyap
